compatibility.intro_mobile: {{ product_title }} is a medical device that is regulated per federal and international regulations; we rigorously test and validate devices with smartphones and tablets to meet or exceed these regulations before we claim compatibility. We routinely add support for new phones and tablets. Check back if your device is not listed below.
compatibility.intro_band: KardiaBand is a medical device that is regulated per federal and international regulations; we rigorously test and validate devices with smartphones and tablets to meet or exceed these regulations before we claim compatibility. We routinely add support for new phones and tablets. Check back if your device is not listed below.
compatibility.tested_for_compatibility: Tested for compatibility with the following Android devices:
compatibility.use_of_kardia_mobile_requires_html: Use of KardiaMobile requires the companion app Kardia, available for download in the {{itunes_url}} and {{play_url}}.
compatibility.use_of_kardia_band_requires_html: Use of KardiaBand requires the companion app Kardia, available for download in the {{itunes_url}}.
compatibility.kb_requires: KardiaBand requires a paired iPhone and Apple Watch, each of which must be in the list below:

return_policy.p1_html: AliveCor will issue you a full refund on your purchase if you contact us within 30 days of delivery. To request a refund, contact AliveCor Support at support@alivecor.com or (855) 338-8800. We will issue you an RMA number to include when you ship your device back to us and will process your refund upon receipt of your device.
return_policy.p2_html: If your device has stopped working and is still under warranty please contact us for troubleshooting assistance. If we find that your device is in fact defective while within the warranty period we will issue a replacement upon receipt of the faulty device.

tech_specs_kardiamobile.electrode_dims: Two 3 cm x 3 cm stainless steel electrodes

tech_specs_kardiamobile6l.electrode_dims: Three 3 cm x 3 cm stainless steel electrodes

tech_specs_kardiaband.product_dims: 2.1 x 2.0 x 0.8 cm, 3 cm2 stainless-steel electrode

promo_banner.message: FREE ground shipping for a limited time on orders of $99 or more

discount_notification.message: Discount code will be applied at checkout:

kardiamobile_home.message_html: The best‑selling FDA‑cleared single‑lead personal EKG.Detect Atrial Fibrillation or Normal heart rhythm with a medical-grade EKG anytime, anywhere.

kardiamobile6l_home.message_html: The first and only FDA‑cleared six‑lead personal EKG that can detect AFib, Bradycardia, Tachycardia, and more. When it comes to managing your heart health from home, it doesn’t get easier, smarter, or more powerful than this.
